name: Hentai Breaker
description:
The game

Hentai Breaker is a "brick breaker" game, you need to destroy all bricks in the level in order to complete it. You can see "more" of the girls from completing the levels on Hard Mode.

Features


- Enjoy 21 levels.

- Progress through the game to unlock the gallery and customization.

- Unlock every girl on the gallery by finishing the levels on Hard Mode.

- Finish all levels on Hard Mode to unlock the "ultimate" Level 11, big challenge, great reward.
